JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The application was lodged by Mr PERSON , a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of PERSON , GPE . He acts pro se before the ORG . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON and PERSON , ORG of GPE at ORG .
The facts , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant , who participated in the GPE nuclear disaster relief operation , brought proceedings before ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) against the local social security office seeking increase of his DATE monetary allowance . He also sought to recover the unpaid sum .

On DATE ORG awarded the applicant a lump sum in arrears and ordered that his DATE allowance be increased starting from DATE . ORG also granted the applicant ’s claim for non - pecuniary damage and costs . The judgment of DATE was not appealed against and became final and enforceable .
The lump sum awarded was paid to the applicant shortly after the judgment of DATE had entered into force .

Increased DATE allowance was being paid to the applicant until DATE . Payment was then discontinued . For that reason the applicant lodged a claim with ORG complaining about non - enforcement of the judgment of DATE . On CARDINAL DATE ORG held in the applicant ’s favour and in addition awarded him a sum corresponding to the missing payments DATE . That judgment became final and was swiftly enforced .

Subsequently , the applicant lodged a claim for compensation due to the failure to pay the DATE allowances DATE in line with the judgment of DATE . On DATE ORG allowed the applicant ’s claim . With reference to the direct applicability of the LAW pursuant to LAW and the reasonabletime requirement contained in LAW thereof , ORG acknowledged the lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment of DATE in the applicant ’s favour . It concluded that he had suffered nonpecuniary damage . ORG granted the applicant MONEY ( MONEY ) in compensation . That judgment was upheld on appeal by ORG on DATE . It was enforced on DATE .
